languages.text: {n}На переговорном устройстве Джай зажигается огонек вызова. Вежливо кивнув вам и отведя глаза, контрабандистка некоторое время сосредоточенно вслушивается в послание, транслируемое вокс-бусиной. С каждым мгновением лицо ее становится все мрачнее. Нервным движением Джай обрывает вызов.{/n}

{n}Jae's communication device lights up, indicating an incoming message. She gives you a polite nod, looks away, and focuses on the message that is being transmitted to her comm-bead. With each passing moment, her expression darkens. Then she cuts off the transmission with a nervous gesture.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На переговорном устройстве Джай зажигается огонек вызова. Вежливо кивнув вам и отведя глаза, контрабандистка некоторое время сосредоточенно вслушивается в послание, транслируемое вокс-бусиной. С каждым мгновением лицо ее становится все мрачнее. Нервным движением Джай обрывает вызов.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ジェイの通信装置が点灯し、メッセージの着信を示す。彼女は礼儀正しく頷いてから目をそらし、通信機に送信されたメッセージに意識を集中する。時間が経つにつれて、彼女の表情は暗くなっていく。そして、彼女は緊張した仕草で通信を切った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's communication device lights up, indicating an incoming message. She gives you a polite nod, looks away, and focuses on the message that is being transmitted to her comm-bead. With each passing moment, her expression darkens. Then she cuts off the transmission with a nervous gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイの通信装置が点灯し、メッセージの着信を示す。彼女は礼儀正しく頷いてから目をそらし、通信機に送信されたメッセージに意識を集中する。時間が経つにつれて、彼女の表情は暗くなっていく。そして、彼女は緊張した仕草で通信を切った。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊的通讯珠亮了起来，显示有信息传入。她礼貌地朝你点点头，之后移开了目光，认真聆听着传入的信息。在这之后，她的脸色渐渐变得阴沉下来，随后以紧张的动作切断了传输。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's communication device lights up, indicating an incoming message. She gives you a polite nod, looks away, and focuses on the message that is being transmitted to her comm-bead. With each passing moment, her expression darkens. Then she cuts off the transmission with a nervous gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊的通讯珠亮了起来，显示有信息传入。她礼貌地朝你点点头，之后移开了目光，认真聆听着传入的信息。在这之后，她的脸色渐渐变得阴沉下来，随后以紧张的动作切断了传输。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le dispositif de communication de Jae s'allume. Elle a reçu un message. Elle hoche poliment la tête, détourne le regard et se concentre sur le message qui est transmis à son communicateur. Son expression semble plus sombre à chaque instant. Puis elle coupe la transmission d'un geste nerveux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's communication device lights up, indicating an incoming message. She gives you a polite nod, looks away, and focuses on the message that is being transmitted to her comm-bead. With each passing moment, her expression darkens. Then she cuts off the transmission with a nervous gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le dispositif de communication de Jae s'allume. Elle a reçu un message. Elle hoche poliment la tête, détourne le regard et se concentre sur le message qui est transmis à son communicateur. Son expression semble plus sombre à chaque instant. Puis elle coupe la transmission d'un geste nerveux.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}El dispositivo de comunicación de Jae se ilumina para indicar la llegada de un mensaje. Asiente educadamente, aparta la mirada y se centra en el mensaje que recibe su cuenta de comunicaciones. Su expresión se oscurece a cada momento. Con gesto nervioso, corta la transmisión.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's communication device lights up, indicating an incoming message. She gives you a polite nod, looks away, and focuses on the message that is being transmitted to her comm-bead. With each passing moment, her expression darkens. Then she cuts off the transmission with a nervous gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El dispositivo de comunicación de Jae se ilumina para indicar la llegada de un mensaje. Asiente educadamente, aparta la mirada y se centra en el mensaje que recibe su cuenta de comunicación. Su expresión se oscurece a cada momento. Con gesto nervioso, corta la transmisión.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jaes Kommunikationsgerät leuchtet auf und kündigt eine Nachricht an. Sie nickt dir höflich zu, wendet den Blick ab und konzentriert sich auf die eingehende Nachricht. Ihre Miene verdüstert sich von Sekunde zu Sekunde. Dann beendet sie die Übertragung mit einer nervösen Geste.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's communication device lights up, indicating an incoming message. She gives you a polite nod, looks away, and focuses on the message that is being transmitted to her comm-bead. With each passing moment, her expression darkens. Then she cuts off the transmission with a nervous gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jaes Kommunikationsgerät leuchtet auf und kündigt eine Nachricht an. Sie nickt dir höflich zu, wendet den Blick ab und konzentriert sich auf die eingehende Nachricht. Ihre Miene verdüstert sich von Sekunde zu Sekunde. Dann beendet sie die Übertragung mit einer nervösen Geste.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın iletişim aygıtı yanıp sönerek bir mesaj geldiğini işaret ediyor. Jae da hafifçe başını eğip diğer tarafa bakıyor ve mikro telsizine iletilen mesaja odaklanıyor. Yüz ifadesi giderek kararıyor. Ardından da gergin bir el hareketiyle iletiyi kapatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's communication device lights up, indicating an incoming message. She gives you a polite nod, looks away, and focuses on the message that is being transmitted to her comm-bead. With each passing moment, her expression darkens. Then she cuts off the transmission with a nervous gesture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın iletişim aygıtı yanıp sönerek bir mesaj geldiğine işaret ediyor. Sana hafifçe başını eğip diğer tarafa bakıyor ve mikro telsizine iletilen mesaja odaklanıyor. Yüz ifadesi giderek kararmaya başlıyor. Ardından da gergin bir el hareketiyle iletiyi kapatıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
